BrowserTestBench
Rules
  • Ajax request-header manipulation
  • Cookie Manipulation
  • Document Domain Manipulation
  • DOM XSS
  • JavaScript Injection
  • Client-side Json Injection
  • Link Manipulation
  • Open Redirect
  • Client side SQL injection
  • HTML 5 - Storage manipulation
  • Client-side XPath Injection
  • Sources

Sources

These vulnerabilities source the payload from a component of the address bar, usually the fragment, and use javascript sinks to trigger DOM based XSS.

URL Based:
  • document.baseURI
  • document.documentURI
  • window.location.hash
  • window.location.href
  • window.location
  • window.location.pathname
  • window.location.search
  • window.location.URL
Window / Document Sources:
  • document.referrer
  • window.name
External:
  • Window Messaging (post messages)
Other:
  • document.cookie
